I 100% recommend Claire. She is an amazing decorator - very knowledgeable, experienced and skilled.  We have used her 4 times now, for different houses and have already booked her in for January 2026 as we have had a massive leak from our roof and the water staining is vast.  She uses specialist treatments and paints for water damaged areas. She is polite, efficient and always leaves the workspace clean and tidy between coats. She always turned up on time and I wouldn‚Äôt hesitate in recommending her to anyone!

content.text: We recently refurbished a house in Sussex and we asked the Decorating Lady (Claire) to decorate throughout. She was extremely hard-working, reliable and personable and we thrilled with her professionalism and attention to detail. The house looked absolutely amazing when she had finished, all done to an extremely high standard! We would highly recommend her services!!

I am a stickler for expecting work to be done properly, and I have to admit that Steve and his gang more than fulfilled my expectations. Steve visited measured up and designed the bathroom with lots of good ideas; these were supplied in several cad designs which we accepted, we also visited one of his recent clients. All the materials used in our installation including all the units, shower pump, vanity mirror, tiling and flooring are all of very high quality. The workmanship which included the plastering, plumbing, electrics and decorating are also first class. My wife and myself are very pleased with the whole project and would not hesitate to recommend Steve and his team at A+ Design and Build South.
content.author: Mike Turner

content.text:
We recently used A+ Design and Build South to remodel both our upstairs and downstairs bathrooms, and we couldn‚Äôt be more pleased with the results. The craftsmanship was outstanding, and the attention to detail really shows in the finished work.

The team was incredibly responsive to any changes we requested along the way and impressed us with innovative solutions that worked seamlessly with the existing architecture and pipework. Communication throughout the project was excellent, and there were no hidden costs, everything was clear and transparent.

Everyone on the team was punctual, respectful, and tidy, making the whole process smooth and stress-free. We would have no hesitation in recommending A+ Design and Build South and will definitely consider them for future projects.
content.author: Sam ‚ÄúSmithers‚Äù Richards

I had been to other companies who said i couldn't have what i wanted but Steve was completely knowledgable and gave us the bathroom we wanted.  Jack one of the fitters was an absolute delight, everyone was so nice and cleared up every day before they left.  The end result was stunning, such a high quality.  I also wanted to add that Steve and Jack went the extra mile and helped with things that cropped up along the way  Thank you so much, will definitely work with them for any new projects. :)
